columns.name: db_cluster_identifier
columns.description: Contains a user-supplied DB cluster identifier. This identifier is the unique key that identifies a DB cluster.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB cluster.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the current state of this DB cluster.

columns.name: cluster_create_time
columns.description: Specifies the time when the DB cluster was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: AllocatedStorage always returns 1, because Neptune DB cluster storage size is not fixed, but instead automatically adjusts as needed.

columns.name: automatic_restart_time
columns.description: Time at which the DB cluster will be automatically restarted.

columns.name: backup_retention_period
columns.description: Specifies the number of days for which automatic DB snapshots are retained.

columns.name: clone_group_id
columns.description: Identifies the clone group to which the DB cluster is associated.

columns.name: copy_tags_to_snapshot
columns.description: If set to true, tags are copied to any snapshot of the DB cluster that is created.

columns.name: cross_account_clone
columns.description: If set to true, the DB cluster can be cloned across accounts.

columns.name: db_cluster_parameter_group
columns.description: Specifies the name of the DB cluster parameter group for the DB cluster.

columns.name: db_subnet_group
columns.description: Specifies information on the subnet group associated with the DB cluster.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: Contains the name of the initial database of this DB cluster that was provided.

columns.name: db_cluster_resource_id
columns.description: The Amazon Region-unique, immutable identifier for the DB cluster.

columns.name: deletion_protection
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the DB cluster has deletion protection enabled.

columns.name: earliest_restorable_time
columns.description: Specifies the earliest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: Specifies the connection endpoint for the primary instance of the DB cluster.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: Provides the name of the database engine to be used for this DB cluster.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Indicates the database engine version.

columns.name: hosted_zone_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted zone.

columns.name: iam_database_authentication_enabled
columns.description: True if mapping of Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled, and otherwise false.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: If StorageEncrypted is true, the Amazon KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB cluster.

columns.name: latest_restorable_time
columns.description: Specifies the latest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

columns.name: multi_az
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster has instances in multiple Availability Zones.

columns.name: percent_progress
columns.description: Specifies the progress of the operation as a percentage.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the database engine is listening on.

columns.name: preferred_backup_window
columns.description: Specifies the daily time range during which automated backups are created if automated backups are enabled, as determined by the BackupRetentionPeriod.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

columns.name: reader_endpoint
columns.description: The reader endpoint for the DB cluster.

columns.name: storage_encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster is encrypted.

columns.name: associated_roles
columns.description: Provides a list of the Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles.

columns.name: availability_zones
columns.description: Provides the list of EC2 Availability Zones that instances in the DB cluster can be created in.

columns.name: db_cluster_members
columns.description: Provides the list of instances that make up the DB cluster.

columns.name: enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports
columns.description: A list of log types that this DB cluster is configured to export to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: read_replica_identifiers
columns.description: Contains one or more identifiers of the Read Replicas associated with this DB cluster.

columns.name: vpc_security_groups
columns.description: Provides a list of VPC security groups that the DB cluster belongs to.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the resource.
